name: CITY OF BEAVERTON
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to local transportation, economic development, arts, public safety and water infrastructure projects. Support funding for EPA brownfield cleanup and NEH Challenge grants.
Support preservation of tax exempt municipal bonds and private activity bonds, expansion of low income housing tax credit and restoration of advanced refunding and state and local tax deduction.
